opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Use non free libraries/header
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Search / include non-free licensed libraries and header files, located under the non-free directory.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Hide C code from ASM
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Hides your ugly and inefficient c-code from the asm file, so you can always blame the compiler :)

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Verbose actions
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Shows the various actions the compiler is performing.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Verbose commands
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Shows the actual commands the compiler is executing.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Output more debug info
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: emit debug info in assembly output

opt:enumOption.opt:desc: Defines the stack model to be used.

opt:selection.opt:desc: Selects small stack model. 8 bit stack and frame pointers. Supports 256 bytes stack size.
Selects large stack model. 16 bit stack and frame pointers. Supports 65536 bytes stack size.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: No BANKSEL
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Do not generate BANKSEL assembler directives.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Extended intructions
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Enable extended instruction set/literal offset addressing mode. Use with care!

opt:selection.opt:name: Level 1
opt:selection.opt:desc: checks previous used register and if it is the same then does not emit BANKSEL, accounts only for labels.

opt:selection.opt:name: Level 2
opt:selection.opt:desc: tries to check the location of (even different) symbols and removes BANKSELs if they are in the same bank.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Don't optimize goto's
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Do not use (conditional) BRA instead of GOTO.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Dataflow optimize
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Analyze the dataflow of the generated code and improve it.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Output more debug info
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Similar to --debug, but dumps more information.

opt:booleanOption.opt:name: Output p-code debug info
opt:booleanOption.opt:desc: Enable pcode debugging information in translation.
